title: Design Thinking-Based Online Education Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Experience in online learning environments and fundamental digital literacy
context.additional_context: Experiential course to strengthen learner-customized online instructional design capabilities, conducted in VR simulation environments emphasizing social interaction and practical skill development

learning_goals: Create at least three empathy maps for learner needs analysis
Develop two educational scenarios applying the five-stage design thinking process (Empathize-Define-Ideate-Prototype-Test)
Design an online training module that improves learner engagement by over 20% using VR-based simulation tools
Achieve a score of 80 or above on the summative assessment (average of 4.0 or above on a 5-point scale)
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
